operations.command:
# Full verification from plan
echo "=== 1. Trading domain generation ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain trading --project-name x | python3 -c "import json,sys; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print('Valid JSON:', bool(d)); print('Coverage:', d['dimensions']['coverage']['min_percent'])"

echo ""
echo "=== 2. Workflow domain coverage ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain workflow --project-name x | python3 -c "import json,sys; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print('Coverage:', d['dimensions']['coverage']['min_percent'])"

echo ""
echo "=== 3. Validate data domain config ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain data --project-name x --output /tmp/data-verify.json
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --validate /tmp/data-verify.json

echo ""
echo "=== 4. Scaffold test with trading domain ==="
rm -rf /tmp/test-trading
bash ~/.claude/templates/validation/scaffold.sh /tmp/test-trading trading 2>&1 | head -5
echo "Dimensions count: $(cat /tmp/test-trading/.claude/validation/config.json | python3 -c "import json,sys; print(len(json.load(sys.stdin).get('dimensions',{})))")"

echo ""
echo "=== 5. No new files created (extended existing) ==="
echo "config_loader.py exists: $(test -f ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py && echo yes || echo no)"
operations.description: Run full verification checklist from plan

operations.command:
# Check complexity of modified files
echo "=== config_loader.py ==="
wc -l ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py
grep -cE '^\s*(def |async def |function |const .* = |class )' ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py || echo "0 functions"

operations.description: Check code complexity in modified files

operations.command: cd ~/.claude/templates/validation && python3 -m pyright config_loader.py 2>&1 | head -20
cd ~/.claude/templates/validation && python3 -m pyright config_loader.py 2>&1

# Final verification after Pyright fixes
echo "=== Final verification ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain trading --project-name final-test --output /tmp/final-test.json && \
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --validate /tmp/final-test.json && \
echo "" && \
echo "Phase 8 execution complete!"
find /home/sam/.claude/validation-framework/.planning/phases -name "*-UAT.md" -type f 2>/dev/null | head -5

# Test 1: Generate Trading Config via CLI
echo "=== TEST 1: Generate Trading Config ==="
OUTPUT=$(python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain trading --project-name test-proj 2>&1)
echo "$OUTPUT" | python3 -c "
import json, sys
d = json.load(sys.stdin)
checks = [
    ('project_name', d.get('project_name') == 'test-proj'),
    ('domain', d.get('domain') == 'trading'),
    ('coverage.min_percent=80', d.get('dimensions',{}).get('coverage',{}).get('min_percent') == 80),
    ('k8s.enabled=true', d.get('k8s',{}).get('enabled') == True),
    ('14 dimensions', len(d.get('dimensions',{})) == 14),
]
all_pass = all(c[1] for c in checks)
for name, passed in checks:
    print(f'  {\"✓\" if passed else \"✗\"} {name}')
print(f'Result: {\"PASS\" if all_pass else \"FAIL\"}')
"

# Test 2: Generate Workflow Config with 60% Coverage
echo "=== TEST 2: Workflow Config 60% Coverage ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain workflow --project-name test 2>&1 | python3 -c "
import json, sys
d = json.load(sys.stdin)
min_pct = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('coverage',{}).get('min_percent')
fail_under = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('coverage',{}).get('fail_under')
passed = min_pct == 60 and fail_under == 60
print(f'  coverage.min_percent: {min_pct} (expected 60)')
print(f'  coverage.fail_under: {fail_under} (expected 60)')
print(f'Result: {\"PASS\" if passed else \"FAIL\"}')
"

# Test 3: Data Config with Enabled Data Validators
echo "=== TEST 3: Data Config Validators Enabled ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain data --project-name test 2>&1 | python3 -c "
import json, sys
d = json.load(sys.stdin)
di = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('data_integrity',{}).get('enabled')
ac = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('api_contract',{}).get('enabled')
passed = di == True and ac == True
print(f'  data_integrity.enabled: {di} (expected True)')
print(f'  api_contract.enabled: {ac} (expected True)')
print(f'Result: {\"PASS\" if passed else \"FAIL\"}')
"

# Test 4: Write Config to File
echo "=== TEST 4: Write Config to File ==="
rm -f /tmp/uat-test.json
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain general --project-name myproj --output /tmp/uat-test.json 2>&1
if [ -f /tmp/uat-test.json ]; then
    DIM_COUNT=$(python3 -c "import json; print(len(json.load(open('/tmp/uat-test.json')).get('dimensions',{})))")
    echo "  File created: yes"
    echo "  Dimensions count: $DIM_COUNT (expected 14)"
    [ "$DIM_COUNT" = "14" ] && echo "Result: PASS" || echo "Result: FAIL"
else
    echo "  File created: no"
    echo "Result: FAIL"
fi

# Test 5: Validate Generated Config Against Schema
echo "=== TEST 5: Validate Generated Config ==="
rm -f /tmp/uat-validate.json
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain trading --project-name x --output /tmp/uat-validate.json 2>&1
RESULT=$(python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --validate /tmp/uat-validate.json 2>&1)
echo "  Validation output: $RESULT"
[[ "$RESULT" == "Validation OK" ]] && echo "Result: PASS" || echo "Result: FAIL"

# Test 6: Scaffold Trading Project
echo "=== TEST 6: Scaffold Trading Project ==="
rm -rf /tmp/uat-scaffold
bash ~/.claude/templates/validation/scaffold.sh /tmp/uat-scaffold trading 2>&1 | head -5
if [ -f /tmp/uat-scaffold/.claude/validation/config.json ]; then
    python3 -c "
import json
d = json.load(open('/tmp/uat-scaffold/.claude/validation/config.json'))
cov = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('coverage',{}).get('min_percent')
k8s = d.get('k8s',{}).get('enabled')
dims = len(d.get('dimensions',{}))
print(f'  Config file: exists')
print(f'  coverage.min_percent: {cov} (expected 80)')
print(f'  k8s.enabled: {k8s} (expected True)')
print(f'  Dimensions: {dims} (expected 14)')
passed = cov == 80 and k8s == True and dims == 14
print(f'Result: {\"PASS\" if passed else \"FAIL\"}')
"
else
    echo "  Config file: missing"
    echo "Result: FAIL"
fi

# Test 1: Generate Trading Config via CLI (fixed)
echo "=== TEST 1: Generate Trading Config ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain trading --project-name test-proj 2>&1 | python3 -c "
import json, sys
d = json.load(sys.stdin)
checks = [
    ('project_name=test-proj', d.get('project_name') == 'test-proj'),
    ('domain=trading', d.get('domain') == 'trading'),
    ('coverage.min_percent=80', d.get('dimensions',{}).get('coverage',{}).get('min_percent') == 80),
    ('k8s.enabled=true', d.get('k8s',{}).get('enabled') == True),
    ('14 dimensions', len(d.get('dimensions',{})) == 14),
]
all_pass = all(c[1] for c in checks)
for name, passed in checks:
    print(f'  {\"✓\" if passed else \"✗\"} {name}')
print(f'Result: {\"PASS\" if all_pass else \"FAIL\"}')
"

# Test 2: Workflow Config
echo "=== TEST 2: Workflow Config 60% Coverage ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain workflow --project-name test 2>&1 | python3 -c "
import json, sys
d = json.load(sys.stdin)
min_pct = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('coverage',{}).get('min_percent')
fail_under = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('coverage',{}).get('fail_under')

print(f'  coverage.fail_under: {fail_under} (expected 60)')
print(f'Result: {\"PASS\" if passed else \"FAIL\"}')
"

# Test 3: Data Config
echo "=== TEST 3: Data Config Validators Enabled ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain data --project-name test 2>&1 | python3 -c "
import json, sys
d = json.load(sys.stdin)
di = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('data_integrity',{}).get('enabled')
ac = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('api_contract',{}).get('enabled')
passed = di == True and ac == True
print(f'  data_integrity.enabled: {di} (expected True)')
print(f'  api_contract.enabled: {ac} (expected True)')
print(f'Result: {\"PASS\" if passed else \"FAIL\"}')
"
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain trading --project-name test-proj 2>&1 | head -20

# Test 1-3 combined
echo "=== TEST 1: Generate Trading Config ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain trading --project-name test-proj > /tmp/t1.json 2>&1
python3 -c "
import json
d = json.load(open('/tmp/t1.json'))
checks = [
    ('project_name=test-proj', d.get('project_name') == 'test-proj'),
    ('domain=trading', d.get('domain') == 'trading'),
    ('coverage.min_percent=80', d.get('dimensions',{}).get('coverage',{}).get('min_percent') == 80),

    ('14 dimensions', len(d.get('dimensions',{})) == 14),
]
all_pass = all(c[1] for c in checks)
for name, passed in checks:
    print(f'  {chr(10003) if passed else chr(10007)} {name}')
print(f'Result: PASS' if all_pass else 'Result: FAIL')
"

echo ""
echo "=== TEST 2: Workflow Config 60% Coverage ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain workflow --project-name test > /tmp/t2.json 2>&1
python3 -c "

print('Result: PASS' if passed else 'Result: FAIL')
"

echo ""
echo "=== TEST 3: Data Config Validators Enabled ==="
python3 ~/.claude/templates/validation/config_loader.py --generate --domain data --project-name test > /tmp/t3.json 2>&1
python3 -c "

di = d.get('dimensions',{}).get('data_integrity',{}).get('enabled')

print(f'  data_integrity.enabled: {di} (expected True)')
print(f'  api_contract.enabled: {ac} (expected True)')
print('Result: PASS' if passed else 'Result: FAIL')
"

operations.command:
# Check config schema for existing dimension definitions
python3 -c "
import json
schema = json.load(open('/home/sam/.claude/templates/validation/config.schema.json'))
dp = schema.get('\$defs',{}).get('designPrinciplesConfig',{})
oss = schema.get('\$defs',{}).get('ossReuseConfig',{})

print(json.dumps(dp, indent=2))
print()
print('=== ossReuseConfig ===')
print(json.dumps(oss, indent=2))
"

operations.command:
# Check claude-hooks-shared for existing complexity/design checks
find /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared -name "*.py" -o -name "*.sh" 2>/dev/null | xargs grep -l "radon\|complexity\|KISS\|YAGNI\|design.principles" 2>/dev/null | head -10

# Check ~/.claude for existing design/complexity code
find ~/.claude -name "*.py" -o -name "*.sh" 2>/dev/null | xargs grep -l "radon\|complexity\|KISS\|YAGNI\|code.simplif" 2>/dev/null | head -10

# Check backstage SSOT
ls -la ~/backstage/ 2>/dev/null | head -10 || echo "No backstage directory"
find ~/backstage -name "*.md" -o -name "*.json" 2>/dev/null | xargs grep -l "design.principles\|complexity\|validation" 2>/dev/null | head -5

# Check code-simplifier agent definition
grep -r "code-simplifier" ~/.claude/agents/ 2>/dev/null || find ~/.claude -name "*simplifier*" 2>/dev/null | head -5

# Check ralph-loop.py for any existing complexity checks
grep -A10 "complexity\|design\|simplif" /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/hooks/control/ralph-loop.py 2>/dev/null | head -30

# Check gsd:execute-phase-sync for code-simplifier references
grep -r "code-simplifier\|simplifier" ~/.claude/get-shit-done/ 2>/dev/null | head -10

# Check skills for code-simplifier
grep -l "code-simplifier" ~/.claude/skills/*.md 2>/dev/null || echo "No skills with code-simplifier"
ls ~/.claude/skills/ 2>/dev/null | grep -i simpl

# Check monitoring/metrics in hooks-shared
ls /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/hooks/ 2>/dev/null
find /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared -name "*metric*" -o -name "*monitor*" 2>/dev/null | head -10

# Check if there's a metrics collection for code quality
grep -r "radon\|complexity\|cyclomatic\|maintainability" /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/ 2>/dev/null | head -10

cat /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/hooks/metrics/*.py 2>/dev/null | head -100

# Check quality hooks
ls -la /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/hooks/quality/
head -50 /media/sam/1TB/claude-hooks-shared/hooks/quality/*.py 2>/dev/null
mkdir -p /home/sam/.claude/validation-framework/.planning/phases/09-tier2-validators
